Key Match Events: Zack Littell shut down Cleveland for six innings
Logan Driscoll hit his first career homer, a two-run shot
Jonathan Aranda also homered for the Rays
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians played without All-Star left fielder Steven Kwan, who was scratched from the starting lineup due to 'body fatigue'
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland's loss coupled with Kansas City's win reduced the Guardians' division lead to three games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rays manager Kevin Cash brought in Edwin Uceta, returning from his two-game suspension, to get two outs in the eighth
The Rays are facing three division leaders — Baltimore, Philadelphia and Cleveland — on a 10-game trip
